name: Item Qty Sold
query:
SELECT
    sii.parent AS "Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:150",  -- Include reference to the Sales Invoice
    sii.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
    sii.item_name AS "Item Name",
    bin.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150",
    i.custom_principal AS "Principal:Data:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT s.supplier_name) AS "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",  -- Concatenate multiple supplier names
    sii.qty AS "Quantity:Float:150",  -- Get the actual quantity from Sales Invoice Item
    sii.uom AS "UOM:Link/UOM:100",
    sii.conversion_factor AS "UOM Conversion",
    (sii.qty * sii.conversion_factor) AS "Sold QTY",
    si.posting_date AS "Posting Date:Date:120"
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sii
JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice` si ON si.name = sii.parent
JOIN
    `tabBin` bin ON bin.item_code = sii.item_code AND bin.warehouse = sii.warehouse  -- Join Bin to get actual stock
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON i.item_code = sii.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem Supplier` isup ON isup.parent = i.item_code  -- Get item suppliers
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSupplier` s ON s.name = isup.supplier  
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1 
GROUP BY
    sii.parent, sii.item_code, bin.warehouse, i.custom_principal, sii.qty, sii.uom, si.posting_date  -- Group by Sales Invoice and other columns
ORDER BY
    si.posting_date DESC;
